# SnowBits
<div style="display: flex; gap: 10px;">

A simple dApp that allows wallet-to-wallet transfer of AVAX with a message minted to the blockchain along with a meme attached to the transaction section of the dApp.
<img alt="" src="">

## Supported Browsers
